card.name: Aku Djinn
card.text: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature each opponent controls.

card.name: Anvil of Bogardan
card.text: Players have no maximum hand size. At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player draws an additional card, then discards a card.

card.name: Archangel
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Army Ants
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice a land: Destroy target land.

card.name: Betrayal
card.text: Enchant creature an opponent controls Whenever enchanted creature becomes tapped, you draw a card.

card.name: Blanket of Night
card.text: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.

card.name: Bogardan Phoenix
card.text: Flying When Bogardan Phoenix dies, exile it if it had a death counter on it. Otherwise, return it to the battlefield under your control and put a death counter on it.

card.name: Brass-Talon Chimera
card.text: First strike Sacrifice Brass-Talon Chimera: Put a +2/+2 counter on target Chimera creature. It gains first strike.

card.name: Breathstealer's Crypt
card.text: If a player would draw a card, instead he or she draws a card and reveals it. If it's a creature card, that player discards it unless he or she pays 3 life.

card.name: Brood of Cockroaches
card.text: When Brood of Cockroaches is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, at the beginning of the next end step, you lose 1 life and return Brood of Cockroaches to your hand.

card.name: Bull Elephant
card.text: When Bull Elephant enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return two Forests you control to their owner's hand.

card.name: Chronatog
card.text: {0}: Chronatog gets +3/+3 until end of turn. You skip your next turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: City of Solitude
card.text: Players can cast spells and activate abilities only during their own turns.

card.name: Cloud Elemental
card.text: Flying Cloud Elemental can block only creatures with flying.

card.name: Coercion
card.text: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a card from it. That player discards that card.

card.name: Coral Atoll
card.text: Coral Atoll enters the battlefield tapped. When Coral Atoll enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Island you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {C}{U} to your mana pool.

card.name: Corrosion
Creeping Mold
card.text: Destroy target artifact, enchantment, or land.

card.name: Crypt Rats
card.text: {X}: Crypt Rats deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana this way.

card.name: Daraja Griffin
card.text: Flying Sacrifice Daraja Griffin: Destroy target black creature.

card.name: Dark Privilege
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate enchanted creature.

card.name: Death Watch
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature dies, its controller loses life equal to its power and you gain life equal to its toughness.

card.name: Desertion
card.text: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.

card.name: Desolation
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, each player who tapped a land for mana this turn sacrifices a land. Desolation deals 2 damage to each player who sacrificed a Plains this way.

card.name: Diamond Kaleidoscope
card.text: {3}, {T}: Put a 0/1 colorless Prism artifact creature token onto the battlefield. Sacrifice a Prism token: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

card.name: Dormant Volcano
card.text: Dormant Volcano enters the battlefield tapped. When Dormant Volcano enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Mountain you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {C}{R} to your mana pool.

card.name: Dragon Mask
card.text: {3}, {T}: Target creature you control gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Return it to its owner's hand at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Dream Tides
card.text: Creatures don't untap during their controllers' untap steps. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may choose any number of tapped nongreen creatures he or she controls and pay {2} for each creature chosen this way. If the player does, untap those creatures.

card.name: Dwarven Vigilantes
card.text: Whenever Dwarven Vigilantes attacks and isn't blocked, you may have it deal damage equal to its power to target creature. If you do, Dwarven Vigilantes assigns no combat damage this turn.

card.name: Elephant Grass
Elkin Lair
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player exiles a card at random from his or her hand. The player may play that card this turn. At the beginning of the next end step, if the player hasn't played the card, he or she puts it into his or her graveyard.

card.name: Elven Cache
card.text: Return target card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Emerald Charm
card.text: Choose one - Untap target permanent; or destroy target non-Aura enchantment; or target creature loses flying until end of turn.

card.name: Equipoise
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, for each land target player controls in excess of the number you control, choose a land he or she controls, then the chosen permanents phase out. Repeat this process for artifacts and creatures.

card.name: Everglades
card.text: Everglades enters the battlefield tapped. When Everglades enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Swamp you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {C}{B} to your mana pool.

card.name: Eye of Singularity
card.text: When Eye of Singularity enters the battlefield, destroy each permanent with the same name as another permanent, except for basic lands. They can't be regenerated. Whenever a permanent other than a basic land enters the battlefield, destroy all other permanents with that name. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Fallen Askari
card.text: Flanking Fallen Askari can't block.

card.name: Femeref Enchantress
card.text: Whenever an enchantment is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, draw a card.

card.name: Feral Instinct
card.text: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Fireblast
card.text: You may sacrifice two Mountains rather than pay Fireblast's mana cost. Fireblast deals 4 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Firestorm Hellkite
card.text: Flying, trample Cumulative upkeep {U}{R}

card.name: Flooded Shoreline
card.text: {U}{U}, Return two Islands you control to their owner's hand: Return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Forbidden Ritual
card.text: Sacrifice a nontoken permanent. If you do, target opponent loses 2 life unless he or she sacrifices a permanent or discards a card. You may repeat this process any number of times.

card.name: Foreshadow
card.text: Name a card, then target opponent puts the top card of his or her library into his or her graveyard. If that card is the named card, you draw a card. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Freewind Falcon
card.text: Flying, protection from red

card.name: Funeral Charm
card.text: Choose one - Target player discards a card; or target creature gets +2/-1 until end of turn; or target creature gains swampwalk until end of turn.

card.name: Giant Caterpillar
card.text: {G}, Sacrifice Giant Caterpillar: Put a 1/1 green Insect creature token with flying named Butterfly onto the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Goblin Recruiter
card.text: When Goblin Recruiter enters the battlefield, search your library for any number of Goblin cards and reveal those cards. Shuffle your library, then put them on top of it in any order.

card.name: Goblin Swine-Rider
card.text: Whenever Goblin Swine-Rider becomes blocked, it deals 2 damage to each attacking creature and each blocking creature.

card.name: Gossamer Chains
card.text: Return Gossamer Chains to its owner's hand: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by target unblocked creature this turn.

card.name: Griffin Canyon
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}: Untap target Griffin. If it's a creature, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Guiding Spirit
card.text: Flying {T}: If the top card of target player's graveyard is a creature card, put that card on top of that player's library.

card.name: Hearth Charm
card.text: Choose one - Destroy target artifact creature; or attacking creatures get +1/+0 until end of turn; or target creature with power 2 or less can't be blocked this turn.

card.name: Heat Wave
Helm of Awakening
card.text: Spells cost {1} less to cast.

card.name: Honorable Passage
card.text: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature or player this turn, prevent that damage. If damage from a red source is prevented this way, Honorable Passage deals that much damage to the source's controller.

card.name: Hope Charm
card.text: Choose one - Target creature gains first strike until end of turn; or target player gains 2 life; or destroy target Aura.

card.name: Hulking Cyclops
card.text: Hulking Cyclops can't block.

card.name: Impulse
card.text: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Infantry Veteran
card.text: {T}: Target attacking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Infernal Harvest
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Infernal Harvest, return X Swamps you control to their owner's hand. Infernal Harvest deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target creatures.

card.name: Inspiration
card.text: Target player draws two cards.

card.name: Iron-Heart Chimera
card.text: Vigilance Sacrifice Iron-Heart Chimera: Put a +2/+2 counter on target Chimera creature. It gains vigilance.

card.name: Jamuraan Lion
card.text: {W}, {T}: Target creature can't block this turn.

card.name: Juju Bubble
Jungle Basin
card.text: Jungle Basin enters the battlefield tapped. When Jungle Basin enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Forest you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {C}{G} to your mana pool.

card.name: Kaervek's Spite
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Kaervek's Spite, sacrifice all permanents you control and discard your hand. Target player loses 5 life.

card.name: Karoo
card.text: Karoo enters the battlefield tapped. When Karoo enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return an untapped Plains you control to its owner's hand. {T}: Add {C}{W} to your mana pool.

card.name: Katabatic Winds
card.text: Phasing Creatures with flying can't attack or block, and their activated abilities with {T} in their costs can't be activated.

card.name: Keeper of Kookus
card.text: {R}: Keeper of Kookus gains protection from red until end of turn.

card.name: Knight of the Mists
card.text: Flanking When Knight of the Mists enters the battlefield, you may pay {U}. If you don't, destroy target Knight and it can't be regenerated.

card.name: Knight of Valor
card.text: Flanking {1}{W}: Each creature without flanking blocking Knight of Valor gets -1/-1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Kookus
card.text: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, if you don't control a creature named Keeper of Kookus, Kookus deals 3 damage to you and attacks this turn if able. {R}: Kookus gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

card.name: Kyscu Drake
card.text: Flying {G}: Kyscu Drake gets +0/+1 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn. Sacrifice Kyscu Drake and a creature named Spitting Drake: Search your library for a card named Viashivan Dragon and put that card onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Lead-Belly Chimera
card.text: Trample Sacrifice Lead-Belly Chimera: Put a +2/+2 counter on target Chimera creature. It gains trample.

card.name: Lichenthrope
card.text: If damage would be dealt to Lichenthrope, put that many -1/-1 counters on it instead. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a -1/-1 counter from Lichenthrope.

card.name: Lightning Cloud
card.text: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may pay {R}. If you do, Lightning Cloud deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

card.name: Longbow Archer
card.text: First strike; reach

card.name: Magma Mine
card.text: {4}: Put a pressure counter on Magma Mine. {T}, Sacrifice Magma Mine: Magma Mine deals damage equal to the number of pressure counters on it to target creature or player.

card.name: Man-o'-War
card.text: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Matopi Golem
card.text: {1}: Regenerate Matopi Golem. When it regenerates this way, put a -1/-1 counter on it.

card.name: Miraculous Recovery
card.text: Return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Put a +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Mob Mentality
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has trample. Whenever all non-Wall creatures you control attack, enchanted creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is the number of attacking creatures.

card.name: Mortal Wound
card.text: Enchant creature When enchanted creature is dealt damage, destroy it.

card.name: Mundungu
card.text: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} and 1 life.

card.name: Mystic Veil
card.text: You may cast Mystic Veil as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant creature Enchanted creature has shroud.

card.name: Natural Order
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Natural Order, sacrifice a green creature. Search your library for a green creature card and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Necromancy
card.text: You may cast Necromancy as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. When Necromancy enters the battlefield, if it's on the battlefield, it becomes an Aura with "enchant creature put onto the battlefield with Necromancy." Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control and attach Necromancy to it. When Necromancy leaves the battlefield, that creature's controller sacrifices it.

card.name: Necrosavant
card.text: {3}{B}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Return Necrosavant from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate this ability only during your upkeep.

card.name: Nekrataal
card.text: First strike When Nekrataal enters the battlefield, destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. That creature can't be regenerated.

card.name: Ogre Enforcer
card.text: Ogre Enforcer can't be destroyed by lethal damage unless lethal damage dealt by a single source is marked on it.

card.name: Ovinomancer
card.text: When Ovinomancer enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return three basic lands you control to their owner's hand. {T}, Return Ovinomancer to its owner's hand: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. That creature's controller puts a 0/1 green Sheep creature token onto the battlefield.

card.name: Parapet
card.text: You may cast Parapet as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Creatures you control get +0/+1.

card.name: Peace Talks
card.text: This turn and next turn, creatures can't attack, and players and permanents can't be the targets of spells or activated abilities.

card.name: Phyrexian Marauder
card.text: Phyrexian Marauder enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. Phyrexian Marauder can't block. Phyrexian Marauder can't attack unless you pay {1} for each +1/+1 counter on it.

card.name: Pillar Tombs of Aku
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may sacrifice a creature. If that player doesn't, he or she loses 5 life and you sacrifice Pillar Tombs of Aku.

card.name: Prosperity
card.text: Each player draws X cards.

card.name: Pygmy Hippo
card.text: Whenever Pygmy Hippo attacks and isn't blocked, you may have defending player activate a mana ability of each land he or she controls and empty his or her mana pool. If you do, Pygmy Hippo assigns no combat damage this turn and at the beginning of your next main phase this turn, you add an amount of {C} to your mana pool equal to the amount of mana emptied from that player's mana pool this way.

card.name: Quicksand
card.text: {T}: Add {C} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice Quicksand: Target attacking creature without flying gets -1/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Quirion Druid
card.text: {G}, {T}: Target land becomes a 2/2 green creature that's still a land.

card.name: Quirion Ranger
card.text: Return a Forest you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Raging Gorilla
card.text: Whenever Raging Gorilla blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/-2 until end of turn.

card.name: Rainbow Efreet
card.text: Flying {U}{U}: Rainbow Efreet phases out.

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Relic Ward
card.text: You may cast Relic Ward as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact has shroud.

card.name: Remedy
card.text: Prevent the next 5 damage that would be dealt this turn to any number of target creatures and/or players, divided as you choose.

card.name: Resistance Fighter
card.text: Sacrifice Resistance Fighter: Prevent all combat damage target creature would deal this turn.

card.name: Retribution of the Meek
card.text: Destroy all creatures with power 4 or greater. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Righteous Aura
card.text: {W}, Pay 2 life: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

card.name: Righteous War
card.text: White creatures you control have protection from black. Black creatures you control have protection from white.

card.name: River Boa
card.text: Islandwalk {G}: Regenerate River Boa.

card.name: Rock Slide
card.text: Rock Slide deals X damage divided as you choose among any number of target attacking or blocking creatures without flying.

card.name: Rowen
card.text: Reveal the first card you draw each turn. Whenever you reveal a basic land card this way, draw a card.

card.name: Sands of Time
card.text: Each player skips his or her untap step. At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player simultaneously untaps each tapped artifact, creature, and land he or she controls and taps each untapped artifact, creature, and land he or she controls.

card.name: Scalebane's Elite
card.text: Protection from black

card.name: Shimmering Efreet
card.text: Flying Phasing Whenever Shimmering Efreet phases in, target creature phases out.

card.name: Shrieking Drake
card.text: Flying When Shrieking Drake enters the battlefield, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Simoon
card.text: Simoon deals 1 damage to each creature target opponent controls.

card.name: Sisay's Ring
card.text: {T}: Add {C}{C} to your mana pool.

card.name: Snake Basket
card.text: {X}, Sacrifice Snake Basket: Put X 1/1 green Snake creature tokens onto the battlefield. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Solfatara
card.text: Target player can't play land cards this turn. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

card.name: Song of Blood
card.text: Put the top four cards of your library into your graveyard. Whenever a creature attacks this turn, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each creature card put into your graveyard this way.

card.name: Spider Climb
card.text: You may cast Spider Climb as though it had flash. If you cast it any time a sorcery couldn't have been cast, the controller of the permanent it becomes sacrifices it at the beginning of the next cleanup step. Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +0/+3 and has reach.

card.name: Spitting Drake
card.text: Flying {R}: Spitting Drake gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Squandered Resources
card.text: Sacrifice a land: Add to your mana pool one mana of any type the sacrificed land could produce.

card.name: Stampeding Wildebeests
card.text: Trample At the beginning of your upkeep, return a green creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Suleiman's Legacy
card.text: When Suleiman's Legacy enters the battlefield, destroy all Djinns and Efreets. They can't be regenerated. Whenever a Djinn or Efreet enters the battlefield, destroy it. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Summer Bloom
card.text: You may play up to three additional lands this turn.

card.name: Sun Clasp
card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+3. {W}: Return enchanted creature to its owner's hand.

card.name: Suq'Ata Assassin
card.text: Fear Whenever Suq'Ata Assassin attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter.

card.name: Talruum Champion
card.text: First strike Whenever Talruum Champion blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, that creature loses first strike until end of turn.

card.name: Talruum Piper
card.text: All creatures with flying able to block Talruum Piper do so.

card.name: Tar Pit Warrior
card.text: When Tar Pit Warrior becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.

card.name: Teferi's Honor Guard
card.text: Flanking {U}{U}: Teferi's Honor Guard phases out.

card.name: Teferi's Puzzle Box
card.text: At the beginning of each player's draw step, that player puts the cards in his or her hand on the bottom of his or her library in any order, then draws that many cards.

card.name: Teferi's Realm
card.text: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player chooses artifact, creature, land, or non-Aura enchantment. All nontoken permanents of that type phase out.

card.name: Tempest Drake
card.text: Flying, vigilance

card.name: Three Wishes
card.text: Exile the top three cards of your library face down. You may look at those cards for as long as they remain exiled. Until your next turn, you may play those cards. At the beginning of your next upkeep, put any of those cards you didn't play into your graveyard.

card.name: Time and Tide
card.text: Simultaneously, all phased-out creatures phase in and all creatures with phasing phase out.

card.name: Tin-Wing Chimera
card.text: Flying Sacrifice Tin-Wing Chimera: Put a +2/+2 counter on target Chimera creature. It gains flying.

card.name: Tithe
card.text: Search your library for a Plains card. If target opponent controls more lands than you, you may search your library for an additional Plains card. Reveal those cards and put them into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Tremor
card.text: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying.

card.name: Triangle of War
card.text: {2}, Sacrifice Triangle of War: Target creature you control fights target creature an opponent controls.

card.name: Uktabi Orangutan
card.text: When Uktabi Orangutan enters the battlefield, destroy target artifact.

card.name: Undiscovered Paradise
card.text: {T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. During your next untap step, as you untap your permanents, return Undiscovered Paradise to its owner's hand.

card.name: Undo
card.text: Return two target creatures to their owners' hands.

card.name: Urborg Mindsucker
card.text: {B}, Sacrifice Urborg Mindsucker: Target opponent discards a card at random. Activate this ability only any time you could cast a sorcery.

card.name: Vampiric Tutor
card.text: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Vampirism
card.text: Enchant creature When Vampirism enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control. Other creatures you control get -1/-1.

card.name: Vanishing
card.text: Enchant creature {U}{U}: Enchanted creature phases out.

card.name: Viashino Sandstalker
card.text: Haste At the beginning of the end step, return Viashino Sandstalker to its owner's hand.

card.name: Viashivan Dragon
card.text: Flying {R}: Viashivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn. {G}: Viashivan Dragon gets +0/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Vision Charm
card.text: Choose one - Target player puts the top four cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard; or choose a land type and a basic land type, and each land of the first chosen type becomes the second chosen type until end of turn; or target artifact phases out.

card.name: Wake of Vultures
card.text: Flying {1}{B}, Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate Wake of Vultures.

card.name: Wand of Denial
card.text: {T}: Look at the top card of target player's library. If it's a nonland card, you may pay 2 life. If you do, put it into that player's graveyard.

card.name: Warrior's Honor
card.text: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Waterspout Djinn
card.text: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Waterspout Djinn unless you return an untapped Island you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Wicked Reward
card.text: As an additional cost to cast Wicked Reward, sacrifice a creature. Target creature gets +4/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Wind Shear
card.text: Attacking creatures with flying get -2/-2 and lose flying until end of turn.

card.name: Zhalfirin Crusader
card.text: Flanking {1}{W}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to Zhalfirin Crusader this turn is dealt to target creature or player instead.
